attributes.review:
after i downloaded it people managed to get my address and broke into my house, 
tied me and my family down inflicted un imaginable pain and suffering apon is by forcing us to watch the avatar the last airbender live action movie made by m night shamalamadingdong, during the whole ordeal, we were begging, pleading with them to please kill us to release us of the suffering they ignored us to left, right when it ended we started to too feel as if a weight was lifted from our shoulders, but then it played again, it played over and over again non stop for 6 years, i was just now freed of the tourment but it has left permanent mental scarring that no therapy can ever fix
